title: Smores in a Microwave
directions: Place half of a graham cracker on a microwave safe plate so that both halves are squares. (One will be for the bottom of the s'more and the other will be for the top.)
Place a marshmallow on top of the graham cracker half.
Microwave for 10-15 seconds or until the marshmallow starts getting bigger and melts.
Remove from microwave. Place a piece of chocolate and the other graham cracker on top of the marshmallow and press so that the s'more becomes flatter.
